channel.title: Prednisone on Guy James
channel.description: Recent content in Prednisone on Guy James

item.title: Eczema as Koan Part 1
item.author: info@guyjames.com (Guy James)
item.description: This is part one of a three part article; part two is here and the final part is here An excerpt from a recent article on my blog: “About four years ago I spilt up with my girlfriend and subsequently became rather ill – I was eventually hospitalised and on admission the first nurse who saw me in a hospital gown assumed I had been burnt in a house fire, so badly destroyed was the weeping, bleeding skin all over my body.
